description.displayText: We had Shirley as our nanny for about 2 years before COVID. Due to COVID and because I stayed home, we had to let her go. Among the several nannies we had in the past, Shirley was one who showed the most professionalism and love and care for our 3 year-old girl. She always showed up to work on time and was highly dependable. She was professional in her demeanor and really loved and cared for our daughter and played with her while genuinely having a good time. Our daughter had so much fun with Shirley and Shirley also set up several play dates which helped our daughter develop social skills. Further, she read tons of books and worked with our daughter to develop necessary skills. Shirley was always great at communicating with us and promptly followed the schedule we provided. There was never a time when we thought our daughter's well-being was in question when she was with Shirley. She is a great person who really cares for the child.

description.displayText: Our family absolutely loves Shirley. She has been babysitting for our two children for over a year. She is kind, warm, very patient, always punctual and highly professional. She would be such an asset to any family working with her.
description.originalText: Our family absolutely loves Shirley. She has been babysitting for our two children for over a year. She is kind, warm, very patient, always punctual and highly professional. She would be such an asset to any family working with her.

description.displayText: Shirley has been with our family for 2 years and I cannot recommend her enough. Shirley started working with us when my daughter was 5 months old. She is loving, kind, and has a warm and easy demeanor. She is a true baby whisperer and was very helpful in getting my daughter on a good routine. When my daughter was diagnosed w/a severe food allergy as a baby, Shirley was incredibly attentive to the allergic restrictions and put me completely ease. She is great at engaging with my daughter and independently sets up play dates, etc. She is comfortable with children of all ages and I truly cannot say enough about how loving and attentive she is. To say my daughter is very attached to her is an understatement. We will truly miss her but decided to take the opportunity of a full-time preschool space that opened up.

description.displayText: Shirley was great and has a natural ability to care for kids. My 18 month yr old daughter immediately felt comfortable with her. She is very punctual and flexible with your schedule. I was very impressed by the professional way she interacted with my daughter.
description.originalText: Shirley was great and has a natural ability to care for kids. My 18 month yr old daughter immediately felt comfortable with her. She is very punctual and flexible with your schedule. I was very impressed by the professional way she interacted with my daughter.

description.displayText: Shirley is great and exactly what you would want in a nanny.  She watched my 3 month old son only once so far and I could already see how wonderful she is. She is respectful, caring, smart, conscientious and loving. If I needed her for 40 hours a week I would hire her in a heartbeat. She would be a great addition to any family that respects and appreciates good help.  If you're looking for a full time nanny to care for your children look no further.

description.displayText: Seldom do we find a child care provider who genuinely cares for our kids. It was truly a blessing having Shirley to help me care for my kids. She knows what proper child care truly means and requires.  I wish you all the best Shirley!
description.originalText: Seldom do we find a child care provider who genuinely cares for our kids. It was truly a blessing having Shirley to help me care for my kids. She knows what proper child care truly means and requires.  I wish you all the best Shirley!

description.displayText: Shirley has been babysitting my 21-month old son since we moved to NYC in November. My son loves spending time with her. Shirley is a very warm and nurturing caregiver. My son warmed up to her immediately. She gets down on the floor to play with him and knows exactly how to engage him in creative, stimulating activities. Shirley is also very reliable and easy to work with. She straightens up after my son, feeds him, and puts him to bed with no issues. She always sends us pictures so we know how he's doing. Shirley has also watched my sister's 2.5 year old, and she also speaks highly of her experience.  I would highly recommend Shirley as a care giver.
